summary: LegacyTUDataset encapsulates a collection of graph kernel benchmark datasets, loading them as DGLGraph objects with associated class labels, handling missing node features, optional transformations, node count filtering, and caching to support efficient iteration and batching for graph classification tasks.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use interface for loading, preprocessing, and iterating over standard graph classification datasets within DGL, streamlining model development and evaluation workflows.
